Title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
Writer: Richard Rothstein (based on characters created by), Christopher Leitch (based on characters created by), Dean Devlin (based on characters created by), Victor Ostrovsky
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren, Andrei Arlovski, Mike Pyle
Plot: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's 2 kids, take Chernobyl nuclear power plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. 4 Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Gen. UniSol. Luc/JCVD goes in but faces 2 NGUs.
